name: Primal Complex
description:
Explore eerie, long abandoned sites and discover the secrets of Astatin III and its sleepless guards.

Primal Complex offers a fast-paced combat system and high mobility in a 2d platformer environment.

Disclaimer: This game is currently in a pre-Alpha state in development. Any content may be incomplete and/or subject to change.

Many thanks for the assets that made this project possible.
